sentences.en: He has occasional injections to maintain his good health but otherwise he lives a normal life.
sentences.cn: 他偶尔要注射药物保持身体健康，但除此之外他生活一切正常。

sentences.en: He has the occasional cigarette, but mostly he smokes a pipe.
sentences.cn: 他偶尔抽香烟, 但通常是抽烟斗.

sentences.en: He made occasional visits to London.
sentences.cn: 他有时候会去伦敦。

sentences.en: He only has occasional use of a car.
sentences.cn: 他只是偶尔用一下汽车。

sentences.en: He should be allowed the occasional treat.
sentences.cn: 应该准许他偶尔也轻松一下。

sentences.en: He supplemented his income with occasional comedy gigs.
sentences.cn: 他偶尔会表演单口喜剧赚取外快。

sentences.en: He works for us on an occasional basis.
sentences.cn: 他在我们这里做临时工。

sentences.en: I don't smoke cigarettes, but I'm not averse to the occasional cigar.
sentences.cn: 我不吸烟, 但我不反对偶尔抽一支雪茄.

sentences.en: I've had occasional mild headaches all my life.
sentences.cn: 我此生一直有偶尔的轻微头疼。

sentences.en: She flicked through a romantic paperback between occasional dips in the pool.
sentences.cn: 用在泳池里游一阵后歇一阵的几个空当，她翻完了一本平装本言情小说。

sentences.en: She saw the occasional glimmer of a moth's wings.
sentences.cn: 她看见蛾子的翅膀偶尔会泛光。

sentences.en: She went on occasional drinking binges.
sentences.cn: 她偶尔会狂饮一通。

sentences.en: The foggy streets were virtually empty, except for the occasional evening stroller.
sentences.cn: 除了偶尔一两个傍晚出来散步的人，雾蒙蒙的街上空荡荡的。

sentences.en: The menu includes the occasional off-beat item.
sentences.cn: 菜单中包括了偶尔会有的非传统菜肴。

sentences.en: The weather was good except for an occasional shower.
sentences.cn: 除下了一阵大雨外,天气还是很好的.

sentences.en: They had an occasional coffee together after shopping.
sentences.cn: 他们偶尔会在购物后一起喝杯咖啡。

sentences.en: This thing isn't occasional.
sentences.cn: 这件事不是偶然的.

sentences.en: We must figure in occasional expenses in the budget.
sentences.cn: 我们必须在预算中把临时费用算计在内.

sentences.en: We should have enough money for the occasional trip.
sentences.cn: 我们的钱应该足够偶尔出去旅行一次的。

sentences.en: You can even snatch a few hours off, and perhaps negotiate the occasional night off too.
sentences.cn: 你甚至可以抽空休息几小时，商量一下的话没准还能偶尔不用上晚班。

words.tran_cn: 引起...的,激发的,推动的,开始的
纪念的,有目的的,特殊的,庆典的,即席的

trans.tran_en: happening sometimes but not often or regularly
